institution-wrap.institution: National Institute of Food and Agriculture

funding-group.funding-statement: The study was supported by the USDA National Institute of Food & Agriculture (NIFA) Grant NIFA Award: 2014-67004-21631 ( http://nifa.usda.gov/program/agriculture-and-food-research-initiative-afri). The funder had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
